name: /help
description: It will tell you more about each command.

name: /parrot
example: /parrot message: It's not a parrot, it's a parakeet
description: The parrot returns the same sentence with food.

name: /dice
description: returns a random integer less than or equal to a specified number and greater than 0.

name: /choice
description: If you pass a string separated by half-width spaces, it will randomly select and return it.

name: /translate
example: /translate source: English target: Japanese message: hello world
description: Send a message and it will return a line by line translation.

name: /talk
example: /talk message: please tell me your favorite food
description: You can start a new thread and have a conversation there

name: /reminderset
description: Enter the reminder time and message and register

name: /reminderdelete
description: Delete the registered reminder with the specified id

name: /reminderlist
description: You can check the contents of registered reminders
